org.eclipse.wst.xsl.core.internal.validation
Class XSLValidationMessage

java.lang.Object
  org.eclipse.wst.xml.core.internal.validation.core.ValidationMessage
      org.eclipse.wst.xsl.core.internal.validation.XSLValidationMessage

public class XSLValidationMessage
extends org.eclipse.wst.xml.core.internal.validation.core.ValidationMessage

A validation message specific to the XSL validator which adds the ability to specify the XSL node.

Author:
Doug Satchwell
